author: rdonkin
msg: Added recently answered question to FAQ

author: odeakin
msg: Specify UTF-8 encoding to zipfileset - Ant jar task defaults to UTF-8 encoding for file names when we create test jars, but zipfileset uses the platform default encoding when reading the jars causing problems when running tests on zOS.

author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-1786: make the patternsFileContent static, so we only load it once, not 4 times, when running this test
